name: Machinery Mouse
description:
In "Machinery Mouse" you must guide a little mouse through a challenging dungeon. Explore the four levels and collect all the materials to escape.

Will you manage to finish the construction of the machinery module?

Controls:

          - Move with the arrow keys. 

          - Use "Z" as action button.

This game was created in a week for the "NOKIA 3310 JAM 4".
